name: Parking World
summary: The hunt for the ultimate parking space will never be more fun than with Parking World. Create your parking garage and carefully manage its operations and staff, overcome dynamic events, use the latest technology, and get ready to discover what perfect parking really looks like. From festival lined grass and mud lots to VIP valet parking and the hustle and bustle of a multistoried airport parking garage, the quest for the ideal space is detailed and varied.
